thread.title: Area Sports Roundup for Tuesday, Oct. 20
thread.title_full: Area Sports Roundup for Tuesday, Oct. 20

author: Observer-Dispatch
title: Area Sports Roundup for Tuesday, Oct. 20
text: Area Sports Roundup for Tuesday, Oct. 20 Area Sports Roundup for Tuesday, Oct. 20. Comment Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 10:50 PM By Observer-Dispatch Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 10:50 PM Boys Soccer Section III Class A First Round Whitesboro: Anthony LaGatta 1-0, Alex Gorgas 0-1. Ron Belluscio 8 saves. VVS: Jack Collmer 1-0, Evan Chaires 1-0, Francesco Spoletini 0-1. Andrew Gowans 5 saves. Halftime: Tied 0-0. New Hartford 2, Oneida 0 Section III Class A First Round New Hartford (12-3-2): Alex Maring 2-0, Randolph Butler 0-1, Nick Kopyt 0-1. Mike Nassif 6 saves. Oneida: Max Babowicz 10 saves. Halftime: New Hartford 1-0. Central Valley Academy 4, Camden 1 Section III Class A First Round Camden (5-12): Hayley Kelley 1-0. Kiersten Leos 10 saves. Central Valley Academy (12-5): Jazmyn Gillette 4-0, Reilly Rich 0-3, Macy Vitale 0-1. Alyssa Wadsworth 10 saves. Halftime: Central Valley Academy 2-0. New Hartford 9, Phoenix 1 Section III Class A First Round New Hartford (10-0, 15-1-1): Micaela Honsinger 2-1, Jordan Restivo 2-1, Christina Paul 1-2, Meral Evke 1-1, Natalie Burns 1-1, Julianne Sekula 1-0, Christina D'Ambro 1-0. Gabby Hobika 0 saves, Abby Buchholz 2 saves. Phoenix: Stats unavailable. Clinton 3, South Jefferson 2 Section III Class B First Round Clinton (11-6): Jenna Devine 2-1, Sydni Dreimiller 1-0, Darby D'Angelo 0-1, Ericka Arancio 0-1. Audrey Gale 11 saves. South Jefferson (10-6-1): Mackenzie Alexander 1-0, Hayley Maguire 1-0, Mara Hathaway 0-1, Brooke Clement 0-1. Molly Hall 22 saves. Halftime: South Jefferson 2-1. West Canada Valley 3, McGraw 0 Section III Class D First Round West Canada Valley (10-6-1): Madison Greco 2-0, Chloe Murphy 1-0, Joelle Ceneviva 0-3. Olivia Bolton 6 saves. McGraw (8-5-4): Rachel Todd 10 saves. Halftime: West Canada Valley 3-0. Poland 8, Tyburn Academy 0 Section III Class D First Round Poland (15-2): Mikayla Blumenstock 5-0, Shiane Irwin 1-1, Whitney Butler 1-1, Nicole Ryan 1-0, Rebecca Sergott 0-1. Goalie stats unavailable. Tyburn Academy (2-13-1): Goalie stats unavailable. Halftime: Poland 5-0. Men's Soccer Utica College 4, SUNY Canton 2 SUNY Canton (4-12): Nick Escalante 1-0, Maurizio Paniconi 1-0, Kyle Smith 0-2. Patrick Anunziatta 12 saves. Utica (5-11): Peyton LaReaux 2-2, Shane Ruffing 2-0, Raine Owens 0-1. Matthew Milograno 4 saves. Halftime: Utica 3-1.
